contentrichtext.text: '''NVA''' is a three-letter acronym for: *[[National People's Army]], or Nationale Volksarmee, the army of former German Democratic Republic *[[Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie]], a Flemish political party also known as ''New-Flemish Alliance'' *[[NVA (arts organisation)]], stands for ''nacionale vitae activa'' *[[No value added]], management term *North Vietnamese Army, also known as the [[Vietnam People's Army]] *[[NVA (film)]], a German film from 2005 *[[Nonivamide]], an organic compound *The National Vulvodynia Association, an American advocacy group for sufferers of [[vulvodynia]] {{disambig}}
